Articles.Content:
This old comic had the Ceres bright spots all figured out:

http://books.google.com/books?id=wJxNiUuTCdoC&pg=PA39#v=onepage&q&f=false

Ahhh, that old-school bullet-like rocketship Those were good times for science-fiction fans. Everything seemed possible, no one counted money, adventure and discovery was more important than keeping tax payers happy.
LOL! Awesome find! It's just a little before my time, but wow, a lot of memories reading through that. Thank you.
